mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ADMINS (ADMIN_UID, ID, PASSWORD, ADMIN_NAME, NICKNAME, AUTHORITY) VALUE (#{ADMIN_UID}, #{ID}, #{PASSWORD}, #{ADMIN_NAME}, #{NICKNAME}, 'ADMIN')
mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCT_UID, PRODUCT_NAME, CATEGORY_NAME, PURPOSE_NAME, PRICE, DISCOUNT_RATE, STOCK, EXPOSURE FROM PRODUCTS INNER JOIN CATEGORIES ON PRODUCTS.CATEGORY_UID = CATEGORIES.CATEGORY_UID INNER JOIN PURPOSES ON PRODUCTS.PURPOSE_UID = PURPOSES.PURPOSE_UID

SELECT PRODUCT_UID, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_DESC, CATEGORY_NAME, PURPOSE_NAME, BRAND_NAME, ORIGIN_NAME, PRICE, DISCOUNT_RATE, STOCK FROM PRODUCTS INNER JOIN CATEGORIES ON PRODUCTS.CATEGORY_UID = CATEGORIES.CATEGORY_UID INNER JOIN PURPOSES ON PRODUCTS.PURPOSE_UID = PURPOSES.PURPOSE_UID INNER JOIN BRANDS ON PRODUCTS.BRAND_UID = BRANDS.BRAND_UID INNER JOIN ORIGINS ON PRODUCTS.ORIGIN_UID = ORIGINS.ORIGIN_UID WHERE PRODUCT_UID = #{productUid}
